about.details:
Incorporated in 2000, City Pulse Multiplex Limited is engaged in the area of setting-up, managing and operating a multiplexes/miniplex chain in India. There are 14 screens of the company with the 3340 seating capacity under the WOW Cine Pulse brand name across Gujarat.

The company has also debuted in the production work in Love is Blind (Gujarati movie) in 2006. The first cinema screen of the company was established in 2007 in Mehsana. Currently, the company has a presence across 14 locations in Gujarat. The cinemas of the company are surrounded by food courts, restaurants, malls, and car parking facilities which are attractive for patrons.

The company is also planning to launch an innovation entertainment project namely World on Wheel which is a cinema on wheels along with all the facilities like a miniplex / multiplex. The company has already purchased the containers and proposing to launch the new project in fiscal 2020.

The company primarily involved in three types of business, which are:
1. Film Production
2. Film Distribution
3. Film Exhibition

The competitive strengths of the company are:

1. In-depth research-based investment
2. Strategic location
3. Experienced promoters in the film industry
4. Reasonable and affordable price
5. Pleasant Ambience

faqs.question: What is the City Pulse IPO?
faqs.answer:
City Pulse IPO is a SME IPO of 1328000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹3.98 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on June 27, 2019, and closes on July 3, 2019.

Link Intime India Private Ltd is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in City Pulse IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in City Pulse IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in City Pulse IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in City Pulse IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'City Pulse IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When City Pulse IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The City Pulse IPO opens on June 27, 2019 and closes on July 3, 2019.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of City Pulse IPO?
faqs.answer: City Pulse IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for City Pulse IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in City Pulse IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.

faqs.question: When is City Pulse IPO allotment?
faqs.answer: The finalization of Basis of Allotment for City Pulse IPO will be done on Monday, July 8, 2019, and the allotted shares will be credited to your demat account by Tuesday, July 9, 2019. Check the City Pulse IPO allotment status.

faqs.question: When is City Pulse IPO listing date?
faqs.answer: The City Pulse IPO listing date is on Thursday, July 11, 2019.
